headline: How The Story Behind Universal Health Services (UHS) Is Shifting With New Analyst Calls
summary: The slight trim in fair value for Universal Health Services from US$252.18 to US$250.41 per share reflects how recent research is balancing stronger Q3 execution and higher 2025 to 2027 EBITDA assumptions against rising concern about policy and payor mix risks. While several firms are using better demand trends and upgraded EBITDA forecasts to support higher valuations, others are more cautious given the possibility that ACA exchange subsidy changes could affect payor mix and limit upside...
